entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain early in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Rain over southern sections late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount possibly reaching 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
